description: This is the main application class for a Spring Boot Java project. It serves as the entry point for the backend application, configured with the @SpringBootApplication annotation, and initiates the application run in the main method.

classes.name: backendApplication
classes.description: Main application class annotated with @SpringBootApplication, serving as the entry point for the Spring Boot application.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The static main method that launches the Spring Boot application.
